participant_1.background:
I live in a house where I'm not allowed to bring my bladed weapons into the kitchen.
i am good at throwing parties.
I have a home in the country where I can bake and cook to my heart's content.
i love eating barbeque sandwiches and pizza puffs.
i am a graphic designer.

participant_2.background:
I am not rich, but I am trying to learn Swedish because I love hockey and I want to be more comfortable in Sweden.
i want to be a doctor when i graduate.
I would brag about skiing down mountains despite my fear of heights.
i grew up as an orphan.
i like to build things.

content.text: Hi there, I am a graphic designer. What do you do?
Hi, I am trying to learn Swedish because I love hockey and I want to be more comfortable in Sweden.
That is awesome! I love Swedish pancakes.
Me too! They are so delicious.
What is your favorite thing about Sweden?
I love the culture and the people. They are very friendly and welcoming.
I hear the hockey there is amazing!
Yes it is! I would love to play hockey in Sweden.
That would be so cool! I bet you would be great at it.
Thanks! I hope to one day play hockey in Sweden.
I hope you do too! It would be a great experience.
